traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the kocrachon's darkvision.

traits.name: Infernal Rot
entries: A creature afflicted with this disease has the {@condition poisoned} condition until the disease ends. While diseased, creatures gain no benefits from a long rest, gaining {@condition exhaustion} when necessary. If a creature dies while afflicted with Infernal Rot, its corpse transforms into a newborn kocrachon after 4 ({@dice 1d8}) days.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kocrachon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sadism
entries: The kocrachon gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for each different creature it damaged on its previous turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The kocrachon makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Proboscis attack.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Proboscis
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) poison damage. Creatures damaged by this attack must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or suffer the Infernal Rot disease.
